title: 3 easy steps to produce Vayne tears
body:
1. Pick Cho'gath

2. Enemy team picks Vayne

3. Do this

https://youtu.be/5E_CCCC6SuA

replies.body: lots champions can one shot a bad vayne she's so squishy

> [{quoted}](name=KawaiiShroom,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=THiYAmsQ,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2017-08-02T19:36:39.292+0000)
>
> lots champions can one shot a bad vayne she's so squishy

Its an actual 1 shot, and that vayne was fed

> [{quoted}](name=CTElephant,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=THiYAmsQ,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2017-08-02T20:06:19.181+0000)
>
> Its an actual 1 shot, and that vayne was fed

so what? you choose a hyperscaling champion with no innate/itemized defenses, thats what you get.

> [{quoted}](name=Ich heiße Jeff,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=THiYAmsQ,comment-id=000500000000,timestamp=2017-08-03T01:23:45.402+0000)
>
> so what? you choose a hyperscaling champion with no innate/itemized defenses, thats what you get.

Think of another ability in this game that, without any basic attacks, or other damage sources can 100-0 anyone assuming equal gold and niether is overly fed.
That just highlights the balance issues with Cho'gath.

> [{quoted}](name=Antenora,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=THiYAmsQ,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2017-08-03T00:08:56.036+0000)
>
> That just highlights the balance issues with Cho'gath.

That is the point. Why in the world am I allowed to do that?
That clips just missing a cho mastery emote flash afterwards, and someone to say "outplayed".
Vayne should have built {{item:3053}}, wouldn't matter anyway but at least it would've shown two things that are not working properly, Chogath and Sterak
maybe she shouldve went invisible and procd duskblade 20 times
